manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Sun Zero curtains are the total solution. Fashion + performance all in one!Sun Zero curtains are a practical and affordable way to beautify any room in your house. They will help insulate your home, reduce energy loss, reduce outside noise, and enhance privacy.Windows are one of the major areas of heat and cooling loss in your home. In the summer, Sun Zero curtains block the sun’s rays to keep your room cool. In winter, Sun Zero curtains trap air and help maintain the temperature in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value for Pretty Room-Darkening Panels
reviews.reviewText: Having recently started a new job working alternating shifts (and struggling to adjust to sleeping during daylight hours), I have purchased numerous sets of room-darkening and blackout panels in recent months. The SunZero Cooper Thermal panels have been among the best I’ve tried, and are by far the prettiest - all at an excellent price point!These panels are constructed of a vibrant, heavyweight polyester, with a solid white reverse. These are a stiffer panel than many I’ve tried, retaining their pleated shape after many weeks of hanging. While they are not true blackout panels - the sunlight streaming in does illuminate the panels, as shown in photos - they have done an excellent job reducing and filtering the light, and have better thermal/insulating properties than any other curtain panel we’ve tried recently. We notice a definite reduction in drafts while these curtains are drawn shut.Regarding aesthetics, the botanical print on these curtain panels is stunning and vibrant. The neutral-colored floral pattern pops on the distressed navy blue background. The hardware is also thoughtfully chosen. The large, brushed silver grommets do not appear out of place, but complement the grays and tans of the print, while also allowing the panels to glide open and closed effortlessly.All in all, these have been my favorite of the several brands of room darkening panels I’ve purchased in recent months. SunZero provides a fashionable solution for second- and third-shift workers who do not want to sacrifice style in exchange for quality sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very nice
reviews.reviewText: Great quality fabric. The colors are beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While not true thermal insulation, it does offer a bit of room darkening, slept past my alarm and did not make it to work. lol. I’m giving this a four star as I bought for the insulation purpose, I can still feel a bit of cold air. The color is gorgeous and compliments my quilt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these so much!
reviews.reviewText: I read mixed reviews but took a chance. I love how these look! They changed the entire look of the room and I get tons of compliments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted curtains with subtle color yet a bit boho-ish... and these curtains did not disappoint!! And you definitely cannot beat the price on these... 8.50/panel when I ordered them.I also paired them with new throw pillow covers for our couch:"Sunday Praise Pack of 2 Corduroy Decorative Throw Pillow Covers 20x20 Inch Soft Boho Striped Square Pillow Cases" in mustard.I'm happy <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but lightweight
reviews.reviewText: It is a pretty print but the curtains are very light weight and remind me of a vinyl tablecloth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty pattern, just right sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: Just what I wanted. The sheerness is not really sheer considering they are a black out curtain. But they aren’t heavy and are just the right heaviness. They aren’t “ luxurious” ( meaning the fabric quality) because I don’t live in a luxurious” home. They are very pretty and a great value for the price. Someone mentioned in a previous review that they are “stiff” but I think they are a bit sturdy and I’m very happy with them. They do keep out just the right amount of sun in our summer time afternoons which get very warm here and that’s why I bought them. I ended up buying 4 panels for my average sliding glass door and 4 more for the other window on that wall. It’s a very pretty design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Horrible nasty, nasty fabric - like old fashioned fiber glass. UGLY!!! I just opened to package to put them up for winter - I cannot even IMAGINE - ANY season or situation these would be appropriate for. Waaay to thin for winter. Synthetic material - with a synthetic backing. Doesn't look like they would survive ONE wash. Nasty, toxic look and feel to the fabric. Super-ugly colors! Yuck!! Wish I could return them. Literally THE WORST curtains I have ever seen!!!

It's so hard to find printed curtains right now and even harder when buying online to know if what you're buying is quality or not. These showed up and I was so pleasantly surprised at the colours, the quality, and overall look of them. They look like they're embroidered from a distance, they're lined, and the don't look cheap at all. The picture that's provided on Amazon doesn't do them justice. if you're thinking about these ones, take a chance and order them as they're beautiful!!
These curtains are excellent quality, colourful and exactly as shown. Having filtered light is such a bonus. The pattern is really nice too. I bought 2 sets and am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very pretty but narrow - if you’re looking for large window coverage be careful
reviews.reviewText: Colours are beautiful and good light blocking quality but a little high on per panel price considering narrow width / amount of coverage. That said, I’m completely happy with their aesthetic. If needs to be said, do not iron on reverse side (white side), the light block film will melt of-course.
Love the vibrant colours. Really adds to my living space while providing a sun filter on those very sunny mornings.
